template.body:
# GraphQL queries typically start with a "{" character. Lines that start
# with a # are ignored.
#
# An example GraphQL query might look like:
#
#     {
#       field(arg: "value") {
#         subField
#       }
#     }
#
# Keyboard shortcuts:
#
#   Auto Complete:  Ctrl-Space (or just start typing)
